successes.title: BoXZY Rapid-Change FabLab: Mill, Laser Engraver, 3D Printer
successes.description: Rapidly transforms into 3 kinds of machines: CNC Mill, 3D Printer & Laser Engraver while enhancing precision & power with ballscrews

Pledges.description: HIGH FIVE! - Get a BoXZY sticker and make us smile!
BoXZY T-SHIRT - with your choice of slogan! Represent a revolution with one of our funny shirts!
PART OF THE FAMILY - Get a formal personalized thank you on our website and a t-shirt to make you laugh!
EARLIEST BIRD - BoXZY CNC machine. Get in early and receive a BoXZY desktop CNC milling machine fully assembled with milling head and thirsty for even more attachments. The world will be jealous!
UPGRADE THIS TO DUAL ATTACHMENTS BY PAYING $1699, just specify your second attachment choice during purchase.
EARLIEST BIRD - BoXZY Your way! Get your BoXZY plus Pick 2 attachments from these:

-Makita Milling head
-3D Printing head with print platform
-Laser engraving/cutting head
Comes fully assembled ready to use! You're gonna create some product envy around your house!
BoXZY YOUR WAY!  - Get your BoXZY, plus Pick 2 attachments from these:

-Makita Milling head 
-3D Printing head with print platform 
-Laser engraving/cutting head
Comes fully assembled ready to use! Here comes some product envy!!
